scripts.setup: composer run db:port && composer run db:start && sleep 5 && composer db:wait && composer run wp:core:download && composer run wp:config:create && composer run wp:core:install && composer run wp:login:install && composer run site:link
scripts.clear: composer db:reset && composer db:stop && rm -fr wordpress db-port
scripts.reset: composer run clear && composer run setup
scripts.db:start: install -d db-data && port=`cat db-port` && domain=$(basename `pwd`) && docker pull mariadb && docker start $domain-db || docker run -d --rm --mount src=$(pwd)/db-data,target=/var/lib/mysql,type=bind --name $domain-db -p $port:3306 -e MYSQL_RANDOM_ROOT_PASSWORD=1 -e MYSQL_DATABASE=wordpress -e MYSQL_USER=wordpress -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=wordpress mariadb --character-set-server=utf8mb4 --collation-server=utf8mb4_bin
scripts.db:tests: domain=$(basename `pwd`) && docker exec $domain-db mysql -u wordpress -pwordpress -e 'DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS tests; CREATE SCHEMA tests;'
scripts.db:adminer: port=$((`cat db-port`+1)) && domain=$(basename `pwd`) && docker run -d --link $domain-db:db -p $port:8080 adminer
scripts.wp:config:recreate: composer run wp:config:delete && composer run wp:config:create
scripts.wp:login:install: wp --path=wordpress package install aaemnnosttv/wp-cli-login-command && wp --path=wordpress login install --activate --yes
scripts.site:link: domain=$(basename `pwd`) && cd wordpress && valet unlink $domain && valet link $domain && valet secure
